resources.string: Choose the player who has to drink
The following players have to drink:
Create a rule! If someone breaks that rule, they have to drink
You can\'t be your own mate!
Please fill the above details correctly, make sure that the name you enter is not already entered
- You have to drink when the app says so
- This app is not an excuse for drinking
- You have to reveal a card for your turn, by tapping on it
- Depending on your card multiple things can happen
#1 \"2 is You\" means if you got a card with the number 2 on it, you can choose someone to drink
#2 \"3 is Me\" means if you got a card with the number 3 on it, you have to drink
#3 \"4 is Floor\" means if you got a card with the number 4 on it, everyone has to touch the floor. The last one has to drink.
#4 \"5 is Guys\" means if you got a card with the number 5 on it, every guy has to drink
#5 \"6 is Chicks\" means if you got a card with the number 6 on it, every chick has to drink
#6 \"7 is Heaven\" means if you got a card with the number 7 on it, everyone has to point to the sky. The last one has to drink.
#7 \"8 is Mate\" means if you got a card with the number 8 on it, you have to pick one mate, drink when they drink and vice versa
#8 \"9 is Rhyme\" means if you got a card with the number 9 on it, you have to say a word, then in a chain everyone has to say rhymes to that word. The first who can\'t say a rhyme drinks.
#9 \"10 is Brand\" means if you got a card with the number 10 on it, you have to say an object, then in a chain everyone has to say brands of that object. The first who can\'t say a brand drinks.
#10 If you see a Jack, you can pick a rule. If anyone breaks that rule, they have to drink.

#11 If you see a Queen, it means that you are the Question King. If you ask, a question from any of the players, and they respond to you, they have to drink, but if they respond with a question, you have to drink.
#12 If you see a King, everyone has to drink
#13 Waterfall! If you see an Ace, pick up your glass and drink. 7 In a Mexican wave the rest of the players start to drink. When the last of the player has drank, everyone can finish drinking.
You can\'t use your hands for drinking
The rule you gave is either already in use, or it is incorrect
